name: Alternate Universe Adventure Wow
description:
Important: The web version doesn't seem to work in Chrome, but the downloaded version is better anyway so I recommend just doing that.

Go on an adventure with your roommate Jen, argue about food blogs, confront your deepest flaws, and slightly more in this stupid visual novel that will have you asking, "Why am I playing this?"

This is an unfinished VN I made while learning the ropes of Visual Novel Maker. As it turns out, VNM is a buggy mess¹, so unfortunately this project isn't going to have any additional content. What was completed, however, still available here.

¹There are a few bugs in the game thanks to this, but none of them should be game-breaking. Just don't think about the shitty UI and you should be fine.
